about_the_game:
"純情ギャルと幸せのカタチ ～Shape of Happiness～" is a novel game in which the protagonist, is troubled by the gap between the past and the present of a childhood friend whom he has reunited after several years. Seeking an answer to their relationship.
This Bishojo Game released in 2018 under the "Gold Drip" brand has been reworked for the "CS Novel Club" platform for players of all ages worldwide to enjoy.

◆ Introduction
"... It's a promise! I am going to be Yota's wife!"
Several years later...

"... Is that you, Yota? You haven't changed at all.Oh, you know who I am, right?"
The childhood friend I was looking forward to seeing again is now the complete opposite of what he expected...

◆Synopsis
"... It's a promise! I am going to be Yota's wife!"
When the protagonist "Yota Kawara" was young, he promised to marry his childhood friend in the future.

Several years later, Yota returns to the place of his memories at Shiou Gakuen.
"... Is that you, Yota? You haven't changed at all. Oh, you know who I am, right?"
Yota's excitement about his new life at school is in disarray, when he is reunited with his childhood friend who is now a "Gyaru"...

◆Characters
・Michi Haneda
Yota's childhood friend.
Although she looks like a "Gyaru", she is rather intelligent.
She remembers her promise with Yota even to this day, and will often introduce him by announcing "This guy right here is my fiance!!".
Not only does she excel in her studies, even entering Shiou Gakuen, but she is also great at cooking and housework.
She is in love with Yota and tries to take care of him in his daily life.

・Mayuki Itoi
Michi's friend.
A "Gyaru" who sounds simple-minded when she speaks.
She is an energetic mood maker.
Her stylish outfits are often very revealing.
Studying is not her strong suit, but she somehow manages day by day.
She is the one responsible for transforming Michi into a "Gyaru", and even taught her how to dress and "Gyaru" fashion.

・Natsuko Harekawa
Yota's classmate.
She has many hidden fans due to her beautiful appearance.
However, her gloomy personality leads the people around her to leave her alone. She is often reading books by herself.
She is perplexed as to why Michi is constantly trying to talk to her.
However, she is actually very kind-hearted and not just gloomy.

・Yota Kawara
He is slightly advanced in studying since Shiou Gakuen is rather a top-tier school.
Rather than doing sports or anything outdoors, he prefers staying indoors.
He hasn't forgotten his promise with Michi, but he becomes more shocked seeing her transformation.

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game contain suggestive content, such as sexual content that are not appropriate for minors or all ages.
